alert.note: Alert for Panola; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 5:54PM CDT until April 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Panola County in northeastern Texas... Central Shelby County in eastern Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Logansport, or 16 miles northeast of Center, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Center, Mansfield, Logansport, Tenaha, Joaquin, Converse, Neuville, Shelbyville, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Huxley, South Mansfield, Noble, Grand Cane, Longstreet, Stanley, Carmel, Jericho, Belmont and Pelican. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
